about_the_game:
Heroic Characters 11


This token pack contains 30 tokens. This pack contains new heroic characters.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Female Dragon Fighter
  • Female Dragonborn Fighter
  • Female Elven Druid
  • Female Half-Elf Rogue
  • 2 Female Half-Orc Monks
  • 2 Female Half-Orc Strikers
  • Female Tiefling Sworder
  • Male Aasimar Cleric
  • Male Aasimar Druid
  • Male Aasimar Fighter
  • Male Dragonborn Fighter
  • Male Dragonborn Paladin
  • Male Dwarf Axe Fighter
  • Male Dwarf Cleric
  • Male Dwarf Druid
  • Male Dwarf Paladin
  • Male Elemental Fighter
  • Male Elf Battle Mage
  • Male Gnome Druid
  • Male Gnome Monk
  • Male Gnome Tinker
  • Male Gnome Wizard
  • Male Goliath Ranger
  • Male Half-Elf Wild Ranger
  • Male Half-Elf Wizard
  • Male Half-Orc Chef
  • Male Tiefling Barbarian
  • Male Tiefling Cleric

Released on March 28, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
